document_data.name: Goldengulp Brewery
document_data.mainbody: '''Goldengulp Brewery''' was a brewery located in the [[Chauntea]]n farm-complex known as [[Goldenfields]].
document_data.Location: The Goldengulp Brewery was located in the center of Goldenfields, near the residential buildings.
document_data.Structure:
The brewery was established within a two-story estate.

Adjoined to the rear side of the structure was a large watchtower referred to as the ''Dragon's Spire''. It was so named for a [[bronze dragon]] that once perched upon its peak.
document_data.Services: Goldengulp was known for the production of its [[goldengulp|namesake beer]]. It was served at the local [[Northfurrow's End]] inn.
document_data.Inhabitants: About 60 individuals worked in the brewery, as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
